jobTitle: Master Data Analyst TEMP ( Customer Master COE)

companyInfo.Competitors: Thermo Fisher Scientific, Abbott Labs, bioMérieux

jobDescription: The Customer/Vendor Master Center of Excellence (COE) is responsible for data quality and data processes for the Customer and Vendor data domains. They work with management to ensure data management initiatives and sustaining processes are aligned with the strategic business objectives of the corporation. The COE is responsible for implementing the Corporate Data Policy, the Data Quality Program, and supporting compliance and audit of data for Sarbanes-Oxley and other regulatory requirements within their data domain. The primary measure of success for the COE is sustainable data quality for their data domain as measured and reported by the users of the data.
